infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: TaskEase needs your location to provide weather updates and location-based task suggestions.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: TaskEase needs your location to provide weather updates and location-based task suggestions.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: TaskEase needs access to your microphone for voice input features.
